title: FS: Centered 3 T206s Mullin Horizonal and McIntyre

posts.post_title: FS: Centered 3 T206s Mullin Horizonal and McIntyre
posts.post_content:
PSA 4 Piedmont McIntyre PSA 4  $75  now $70

PSA 5 Sweet Corporaal Mullin throwing  horizontal  $225  now $217

SGC 4.5 Piedmont Mullin throwing horizontal   $120  now $113

Add $3.99 for postage which includes tracking

the back photos are not aligned with the front of the card in pictures...i trust you can figure out which back  goes for which card..

if any questions can pm or [url]jakeg8or12@yahoo.com[/url]
